description: This Java class is a Spring Boot REST controller providing utility endpoints for health checks, documentation redirects, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller defining endpoints for greeting, health check, documentation redirect, and info.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a greeting message indicating the service is running.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects the user to the Swagger UI page, constructing the URL based on the incoming HTTP request.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns a simple health status string 'OK'.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Returns information string about the application.
